content: introducing my first ever crochet pattern i created this for my boyfriend when he requested a crochet hat made with alpaca yarn the alternating front and back post double_crochet stitches create a thick and stretchy ribbing reminiscent of knit i m told it s warm and cozy be sure to get the matching scarf for a set this hat was made especially for a man but i think it would be suitable for women as well the simple design is easy and there are photos included to show the increasing rounds the pattern can easily be customized to fit any head circumference the amount of yarn listed is for an adult size **stitches used ** * chain - chain double_crochet - double_crochet * fpdc - front post double_crochet * bpdc - back post double_crochet * slip_stitch - slip_stitch **materials ** * light worsted weight yarn in two colors 260 yards main color and 180 yards contrasting color * hook g 4 25mm * yarn needle **gauge** the pattern for the gauge is alternating front and back post double crochets for a total of 12 stitches counting the initial chain-2 as a double_crochet this is repeated for 7 row to measure 2 x2
